home.title: Hi, I'm Carlos, Full Stack Developer
home.description: I'm Carlos, a recent graduate with a background in Multiplatform Application Development (DAM) and Web Application Development (DAW). My academic journey has instilled in me a solid foundation in software development. Eager to contribute my skills to dynamic projects, I bring adaptability and a commitment to ongoing learning.

about.title: About
about.content: üëãüèª Hi everyone! I'm Carlos, a recent graduate with a focus on Multiplatform Application Development (DAM) and Web Application Development (DAW). As a junior programmer, my experiences as an intern have equipped me with practical skills in software development. I engage with various technologies and languages, exploring Java, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, and Git, along with frameworks like Spring Boot, Tailwind, Angular, and React. I also delve into emerging technologies such as Flutter, Kotlin Jetpack Compose, and python.
about.content2: üß™ My approach centers on creating high-quality solutions to boost project success. I stay updated on technological trends, committed to continuous learning for skill enhancement. Recognized for adaptability, teamwork, and efficient problem-solving, I embrace new technologies with a proactive mindset. Open to opportunities for professional growth and eager to contribute to exciting projects

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content: Here are some of my projects

urlShort.title: Url Short
urlShort.explanation: Short URL Backend provides services to shorten links and generate associated QR codes. It utilizes Java 11 and Spring Boot, with configurations for secret key and algorithm. Contributions to the project are welcome under the MIT License.

ireneWeb.title: Web Irene-Concept
ireneWeb.explanation: Website created for a client in which to show her personal work.

virtualAssistantPepe.title: Asistente Virtual PEPE
virtualAssistantPepe.explanation: Virtual assistant for task management with various functionalities such as sending messages, searching on Google, or creating summaries.

secondHandMarketSpring.title: Second Hand Market Spring
secondHandMarketSpring.explanation: Final project of the Spring Boot 5 course.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you want to get in contact with me fil the form :)
